other_tests.procedure_name: CT ABDOMEN AND PELVIS WITHOUT CONTRAST
other_tests.findings: Subsegmental atelectasis in the bilateral lower lobes; hypoattenuating liver compatible with severe hepatic steatosis; prominent pancreatic tail with surrounding stranding; gallbladder contains high density material, likely sludge; spleen normal size and attenuation; kidneys normal and symmetric with no hydronephrosis or nephrolithiasis; trace free fluid in the pelvis; no lymphadenopathy.
